articles.description: Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power releases on Amazon Prime on Sept. 2. Here’s everything we know about the show and its Galadriel plotline.
articles.content:
This year, Amazon is taking a big swing. Come September 2, 2022, theyll officially drop their blockbuster new series The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power. 
That subtitle is revealing, of course… [+7171 chars]
